speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Sorry to keep yeh waiting, [lassie/laddie/matey]. Sometimes when I eat PB&J with the kids… you get the idea.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: So I don’t really know much about this… but I heard somewheres that we’re doin’ this newfangled thing called “autosave.” If you see this icon, the game is saving. You can quit the game at anytimes just so long as you can’t see this icon!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: That’s all yeh need to know, I think.
